column1: bina pele dali dali eno yahao
beha selopo emere tlasa bethe hantle
helang ae seka tena tsena keutentsitse
ah na ha u ngwanaka he
etlisa seka etsela ka mona etlisa
seka tsola penti ngwana ntate michael
ako bone mose wahao omotle ona le palesa
e ke eng ena ntho eo
ee ee utswela nna ka mathe
ache wena ure mamello feela e
ere ake unkadime hanyenyane ake uletse
ja le papa ska ja dikhobe feela
seka tswara bethe ena yaka ka dipapa tsena
tsamaya honka setswantso ke sane tlasa setulo
ee ee seka raha mme mamello
ke mohlweng ka moo ka tlung
seka qhala metsi ana ahao ka mona
seka aqhala ka mona he mafi ahao
